name: DoomZ Raiders
effectText: During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 other "DoomZ" card in your hand or face-up field, then add to your hand or Special Summon, 1 "DoomZ" monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy it. You can only use 1 "DoomZ Raiders" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
